text: Pat Torpey (December 13, 1953 - February 7, 2018) was an American drummer. He was known as the drummer and backing vocalist of the hard rock band Mr. Big. Torpey was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He died on February 7, 2018 of complications from Parkinson's disease at the age of 64. ==References== ==Other websites== *Pat Torpey Official Site *Torpey's solo with Mr. Big Category:1953 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:American rock drummers Category:Musicians from Cleveland
title: Pat Torpey
